title: DegreeWheels - University Rideshare Platform
description: A comprehensive university rideshare platform connecting 1,000+ students with real-time notifications and messaging system.
longDescription: Architected using React and Node.js, this platform features PostgreSQL database architecture, secure authentication with university email verification, and Mapbox GL JS integration for dynamic mapping. Achieved 4.7/5.0 user ratings and reduced pickup coordination time by 60%.

title: American Airlines - Baggage Arrival Prediction System
description: Machine learning system achieving 80% accuracy for predicting baggage arrivals, analyzing 50.9M historical records.
longDescription: Developed ARIMA-based forecasting system with 7-day sliding window, improving baggage handling efficiency by 18% for 43.8M bags processed annually at DFW Airport. Applied K-means clustering for flight patterns and modeled bag arrival distributions using Gamma distribution, projected to save $1.2M annually.

title: Enterprise Banking Platform
description: Led development of microservices-based banking platform supporting 3,800+ branches and 10M+ customers.
longDescription: Developed and deployed 25+ microservices using Java, Spring Boot, and Docker, reducing deployment time by 65%. Engineered automated solutions saving $180K annually. Achieved 99.9% uptime and prevented $2.1M in potential downtime costs.
